kingSalman.title: The Word of the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques, May God Protect Him
kingSalman.name: King Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud
kingSalman.quote: And that your country becomes a pioneer in investing in future technologies, so that these technologies, with God's help, become a new pillar for our national economy and the global economy

princeMohamed.title: The Word of the Crown Prince and Prime Minister
princeMohamed.name: Prince Mohammed bin Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud
princeMohamed.quote: Our greatest wealth, unmatched by any other, is an ambitious people, mostly youth, who are the pride of our nation and the guarantee of its future, with God's help

brief.description: The exhibition will be held from 16–18 November at the conference hall of the Marriott Hotel in Riyadh, hosting numerous prestigious local and international universities and educational institutions, along with our ambitious students who are the generation of the future.

goals.card1_description: A gathering for students and distinguished educational institutions
goals.card2_description: An opportunity to meet representatives from over 100 global universities
goals.card3_description: Direct consultations on academic programs, scholarships, and admission requirements
goals.card4_description: Global cooperation in the field of education

joinExpo.title_line1: Welcome to the World of Knowledge!
joinExpo.description: GEB Expo is not just an event, but a global collaboration to build a conscious and skilled generation, ready to lead tomorrow's transformations

program.description: GEB Expo offers a diverse program of events over three days, including interactive workshops, discussion sessions with education experts, and distinguished presentations from participating universities.

logo_alts.sdaia: Saudi Data and Artificial Intelligence Authority
logo_alts.royal_commission_for_makkah_and_holy_sit: Royal Commission for Makkah and Holy Sites
logo_alts.king_abdulaziz_royal_reserve: King Abdulaziz Royal Reserve Development Authority

footer.description: GEB Expo 2025 – The largest educational exhibition bringing together universities, schools, and experts from around the world in a single event full of opportunities and inspiration.
footer.copyright: © All Rights Reserved to GEB Expo 2025

programPage.title: Exhibition Program
programPage.description: Three days of inspiring events and activities — from the official opening ceremony to workshops and presentations

servicesPage.title: Exhibition Services and Facilities
servicesPage.description: A comprehensive set of services to support exhibitors and visitors – from consultations and instant admission to hotel accommodation and comfortable transportation.

consultations.title: Direct Consultations
consultations.description: Direct consultations on academic programs, scholarships, admission requirements, and higher education options.

instant_admission.title: Instant Admission
instant_admission.description: Opportunity for instant admission to participating universities and educational institutions.

meeting_rooms.title: Meeting Rooms
meeting_rooms.description: Dedicated rooms for holding meetings, business discussions, and showcasing products and technologies.

networking.title: Networking and Relationship Building
networking.description: Building relationships with local and international universities and fostering cooperation in the field of education.

job_opportunities.title: Job Opportunities
job_opportunities.description: Discovering employment opportunities at participating universities and educational institutions.

aboutPage.title: About GEB Expo
aboutPage.description: The largest educational platform in the region, bringing together universities, schools, and experts in a single event to showcase the latest academic opportunities and educational technologies.
aboutPage.overview_description: GEB Expo 2025 is a leading platform in education, aiming to connect local and international academic institutions with students and those seeking educational opportunities. The event provides a space for networking, exchanging ideas, and exploring the latest educational innovations and solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: We are here to write a new chapter in global educational cooperation, contributing to building a knowledgeable and skilled generation capable of leading future transformations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Empowering students and academic institutions to connect, learn, and benefit from the latest educational solutions.

aboutPage.why_saudi_description: Saudi Arabia is one of the best host countries for educational exhibitions due to several factors, including its advanced infrastructure and the Kingdom's focus on education, where exhibitions are a key part of its efforts to enhance educational quality. Additionally, its distinguished strategic geographical location makes it an easily accessible destination from all parts of the world, along with a high demand for education.
aboutPage.organizers_description: The exhibition is organized by {expo} through {carezma} Company and {riep} Company

mediaPage.title: Media at GEB Expo
mediaPage.description: Extensive media coverage by major channels and newspapers to ensure the exhibition's messages reach the widest possible audience.
mediaPage.news_description: Through GEB Expo 2025, the latest educational initiatives and partnerships will be announced. Follow the latest news here or through official media outlets.
mediaPage.highlights_description: Links to television reports, articles, and images from various media outlets will be shared here after the exhibition begins.
mediaPage.contact_description: For any inquiries or to coordinate media coverage, please contact:

mediaPartners.saudi_research: Saudi Research and Media Group Logo

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.description: We are here to answer all your inquiries — reach out to us via the form or through social media.

registerPage.hero_subtitle: Choose the registration type — Visitor or Exhibitor — and fill out the form below to participate in the event.
